story_06_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Is this the right place, Skyla?
story_06_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yep! At least, this is where I heard 
she does her training, anyway...
story_06_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Lucario!
Give me a Low Sweep!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Ooh! That Trainer over there looks like
she’s doing exercises with a Lucario!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Do you think she could be the Evolution fighter
you’ve been hearing about?!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Definitely! I heard the Evolution fighter is a
great skater as well, so that’s gotta be her.
story_06_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Wow, I never imagined the Evolution fighter
would be a girl around my age!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Huh? What brings all of you here?
story_06_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: My name’s Rosa! Nice to meet you!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Right back at you! I’m Korrina, the Gym Leader
of Shalour City back in the Kalos region.
What can I do for you?
story_06_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, we heard that Trainers who come and
train with you end up becoming really strong,
and we reeeally want to get stronger!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Is that so! Well, I can definitely relate...
I’d like to grow stronger myself.
story_06_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Hm? Lucario seems to be really curious
about all of you...
story_06_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Well, you seem like a group of interesting
sync pairs, in any case! What have I got to lose?
Sure! Let’s train together!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Yeah! Come on!
Let’s head to the training grounds right now!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Just so you know, we might run into other
eager sync pairs along the way. There’s a
chance they could challenge us to a battle!
story_06_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Just make sure you stick with me and
don’t fall too far behind, OK?
